familyMemberEthics.description: Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest in Trump National Golf Club - Charlotte. It is not clear whether this business entity is the same as an entity called "TNGC Charlotte LLC," from which he resigned as president in 2017. No positions with Trump National Golf Club - Charlotte have been listed on his financial disclosures; the current activity status and ownership structure of TNGC Charlotte LLC also have not been listed. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 11750135 in golf related revenue income from TRUMP NATIONAL GOLF CLUB - CHARLOTTE, valued at $5,000,001 - $25,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf club. Location: Charlotte, NC. See attached schedule.
